articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: World of Warcraft: Shadowlands Season 1 schedule of events - Polygon
articles.description: World of Warcraft: Shadowlands is now well underway, with Season 1 starting on Dec. 8. This season brings new rewards and activities to the game, including Mythic+ dungeons and the spooky vampire raid of Castle Nathria. More content will unlock on Dec. 15 and…
articles.content: World of Warcrafts newest expansion, Shadowlands, has been out since Nov. 23, and players have had time to go through the games leveling zones and try out the infinite tower of Torghast. On Dec. 8, S… [+3666 chars]
